title: What did floor traders for the Philadelphia Stock Exchange look like in the 1800's? - Quora

response.answer_text: Q: What did floor traders for the Philadelphia Stock Exchange look like in the 1800's? Possibly like these guys?  I would assume all were male, I would assume all were white, and I would also assume that many has some pretty impressive whiskers. Other than that… Is this REALLY what you wanted to know?
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Theodore Weld Smith
